members.signatureBeforeChange: static int[] init(Device device, Image image, ImageData source, ImageData mask)
members.signatureAfterChange: static int[] init(Device device, Image image, ImageData source, ImageData mask)
diff: -	ImageData newMask = new ImageData(mask.width, mask.height, 1, mask.palette, 2, newMaskData);
-	/* Set the fields and create the icon */
+	imageData.maskData = ImageData.convertPad(mask.data, mask.width, mask.height, mask.depth, mask.scanlinePad, imageData.maskPad);

members.signatureBeforeChange: public Cursor(Device device, ImageData source, int hotspotX, int hotspotY)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Cursor(Device device, ImageData source, int hotspotX, int hotspotY)
diff: -	/* Ensure depth and scanline pad are equal to 1 */
-	 * Make sure the mask is padded properly. Unix requires icon masks
-	 * to have a scanline pad of 1.
-		ImageData newMask = new ImageData(mask.width, mask.height, 1, mask.palette, 1, newMaskData);
-	/* Swap the bits in each byte */
+	/* Swap the bits in each byte and convert scanline pad to 2 */
+	sourceData = ImageData.convertPad(sourceData, source.width, source.height, source.depth, source.scanlinePad, 2);
+	maskData = ImageData.convertPad(maskData, mask.width, mask.height, mask.depth, mask.scanlinePad, 2);

members.signatureBeforeChange: public Cursor(Device device, ImageData source, int hotspotX, int hotspotY)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Cursor(Device device, ImageData source, int hotspotX, int hotspotY)
diff: -	/* Ensure depth and scanline pad are equal to 1 */
-	 * Make sure the mask is padded properly. Unix requires icon masks
-	 * to have a scanline pad of 1.
-		ImageData newMask = new ImageData(mask.width, mask.height, 1, mask.palette, 1, newMaskData);
-	/* Swap the bits in each byte */
+	/* Swap the bits in each byte and convert scanline pad to 2 */
+	sourceData = ImageData.convertPad(sourceData, source.width, source.height, source.depth, source.scanlinePad, 2);
+	maskData = ImageData.convertPad(maskData, mask.width, mask.height, mask.depth, mask.scanlinePad, 2);
